Forums: http://rspseclipse317.createaforum.com/
Client Download: http://uppit.com/pmqkjuv640pj/Eclipse_317_Client.rar ^ -Client is big cuz i cant figure out y the autocache donloader dont work :(- ^
Webclient: http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Eclipse%20317
[size=11pt]~Features~[/size]
--Added Avatar of Destruction --Every Skill working --All skill's have their own area's to train --Many stable way's to make money --Awsome donor zone --Daily Updates --Added Phoenix --New Armor's/Weapon's --Clipped NPC's/Following/Attacking --Awsome Donator benefits! --about 35% Castle Wars --Co-op Slayer --Clipped NPC's/Following/Attacking --Memory leak/Deadlocks have been patched --Deposit all in bank working --Active & nice owners --Online 24/7 --Double Xp weekends --Safe Pk (Dont lose items) --Knights Assault minigame --Fully working Barrows --Working godwars! --Overloads --Mystery Boxes --Almost full Pest Control --Warriors Guild --Slayer Tower --Wide variety of shops --Sea Troll Queen & Sea snake --King Black Dragon --Turmoil --Added Barrelchest --Login Messages --Added Staffzone --- + Alot More!!

[size=11pt]~Features~[/size]

–Added Avatar of Destruction

–All skill’s have their own area’s to train
